mapper.select: select packageno,COMPANY,STARTDATE,LASTDATE,AIRLINE,startAIRPLANEID,lastAIRPLANEID,TERM,PACKAGENAME,PRICE,RESERVATIONAB,MINPERSONNEL,PRESENTRESERVATION, PERSONNEL,loc,LINK,city,image1,image2,image3,doorimg,overview,detail,babyprice,childprice,tax,imgdetail from packagedb where packageno = #{packageno} and startdate >= sysdate

select packageno,COMPANY,STARTDATE,LASTDATE,AIRLINE,startAIRPLANEID,lastAIRPLANEID,TERM,PACKAGENAME,PRICE,RESERVATIONAB,MINPERSONNEL,PRESENTRESERVATION, PERSONNEL,loc,LINK,city,image1,image2,image3,doorimg,overview,detail from packagedb where packageno = #{packageno} and to_char(startdate,'yyyy/mm') = #{startdate} and startdate >= sysdate
select count(*) as cnt from packagedb d where packageno=#{packageno} and startdate >= sysdate

select packageno,COMPANY,STARTDATE,LASTDATE,AIRLINE,startAIRPLANEID,lastAIRPLANEID,TERM,PACKAGENAME,PRICE,RESERVATIONAB,MINPERSONNEL,PRESENTRESERVATION, PERSONNEL,loc,LINK,city,image1,image2,image3,doorimg,overview,detail from packagedb where city = #{city} and startdate >= sysdate
